attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government to recognise that regulation and accreditation help is needed for UK Hydrogen Fuel Cell developers like de Verde Ltd
http://www.hydrogenhybrids.uk.com to enable UK drivers to have their vehicles safely covered by UK Insurers. The benefits of this emerging clean and affordable technology would enable all UK drivers to lower their fuel bills, lower their emissions and increase the life of their vehicles; and that would be a good thing. right?
